subject: Re: Trueline content
preview: Hi Shane, Noted and we have updated the louvred roof page and published both.Here are the links again:https://trueline.net.au/carports/https://trueline.net.au/patios-pergolas/louvered-patios/If there

full_threads.body:
Hi Shane,

Noted and we have updated the louvred roof page and published both.

Here are the links again:
https://trueline.net.au/carports/
https://trueline.net.au/patios-pergolas/louvered-patios/

If there are significant touch-ups, please let me know.

@jaime thanks, in that case it appears the carport was the odd one out. Either way, this layout has a more logical flow.

Can you please make the pages live? I will send the update to client

Hi @chris done updating louvered page

Updates
- cta button to match on whimsical design
- moved See the louvered patios we’ve built and gallery section in upper part
- add 4 box section in lower part of the page

I just based the updates on the whimsical and docs
whimsical - https://whimsical.com/product-page-wireframe-MuJfe68AwjduVjV8u2gLpa
docs - https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NCo2VbPFpf34feVTtTrVP2RB0Bs0vV-XAmv6DINDaSE/edit#heading=h.qhi4kcad7rdg

Please check and let me know if we have any changes, thanks

Time: +10mins @ricaV2

@jaime Can you please update the layout on Louvred page to match carports. 

Client has flagged that they do not match as per original request.

Hi Chris

If you can make both pages (Carports & Louvred roof) live I'll do another touch up once they're live.

All good to go.

cheers

Regards,

Shane





Shane Hammond

Managing Director

ABN 53 135 177 221

+61 7 3633 6400

+61 434 553 333

shaneh@trueline.net.au

Hi Chris

Thanks Carport is good to go.

Louvered patios I think the images slider needs to move further up the page - seems too much copy before we actually get to see the actual designs/products?
Currently the image slider is at the bottom of the page

What do you think

Regards,

Shane





Shane Hammond

Managing Director

ABN 53 135 177 221

+61 7 3633 6400

+61 434 553 333

shaneh@trueline.net.au

@jaime thanks, looking great, I have shared with Shane at Trueline.

Hi Shane, 

Great news, the carport and louvered patio draft pages are ready for your review. You can see them here: 

Carports - https://trueline.net.au/car-ports-draft
Louvered - https://trueline.net.au/louvered-patios-draft/

Please let me know if there are any tweaks before we go live.

Hi @chris Here are the updates for carports and the louvered page draft

carports - https://trueline.net.au/car-ports-draft
louvered - https://trueline.net.au/louvered-patios-draft/

Updates
- create louvered patios page draft
- update carports content and images
- add louvered patios content and images base on docs

@ricaV2 Time: 45 mins
Hi @jaime can you please provide the 'louvered patios' draft URL as well? I can't seem to find it.

Logged 20mins to Harvest

@chris please check

Hi @ricaV2 done creating the carports page draft

Draft Page: https://trueline.net.au/car-ports-draft
Design Link: https://whimsical.com/product-page-wireframe-MuJfe68AwjduVjV8u2gLpa

Please check thanks

Time: 20 mins

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Shane, 

Many thanks. We'll be looping back once the drafts are ready for your review.

Hi @ricaV2
Can you please assign this to the most appropriate team member? (I presume either Jaime or Glen but your input will be most appreciated.

Please leave the pages in draft for client to review. 

The Dropbox link is: https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/s0nx3gzrvtgm1a7xee2lw/h?dl=0&rlkey=wohflocziyf8ueuqgbgv8qlyr

The design link is: https://whimsical.com/product-page-wireframe-MuJfe68AwjduVjV8u2gLpa

Thanks!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body:
Hi Chris

as per meeting, we have two pieces of content ready to be uploaded using the new product page layout..
Product Page Wireframe
Whimsical combines whiteboards and docs in an all-in-one collaboration hub.
whimsical.com


CONTENT links in Drive
  1. Louvered Patios

  2. Carports

Images have been uploaded to Dropbox.

Insulated roofs content will be ready in the next day or so - we'll get the images ready to go.





Regards,

Shane
